ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Buying Zombie Skins
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to loot them, buy them from other PCs, or buy them from merchants that PCs have sold them too.  It is a pain getting them.  There are several undead
ygData.messageBody:
You have to loot them, buy them from other PCs, or buy them from merchants
that PCs have sold them too. It is a pain getting them. There are several
undead pyramids or something like that which are good places to hunt them.
My favorite is the one south of the centaur camp in South Karana. Save the
skeleton bones and auction them in zone. There are always a lot of necros
in the area.

Good luck! And if you find a better place let me know.
Tanana - Bristlebane
Master Brewer, Potter, Beggar


-----Original Message-----
From: dalka@... [mailto:dalka@...]
Sent: April 18, 2000 2:08 PM
To: EQ_potters@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Buying Zombie Skins


I dont know if this was asked before but........

I know you can buy fish scales and batwings at the merchant in EC. Is there
a place where you can buy zombie skins (used to make vials)? or do you have
to get them as loot?
